foodsCategories.title: Best Whole Wheat
foodsCategories.subtitle: Chocolate Chippers
foodsCategories.description: A cookie is a baked or cooked food that is typically small, flat and sweet. It usually contains flour, sugar, egg, and some type of oil, fat, or butter. It may include other ingredients such as raisins, oats, chocolate chips, nuts, etc.
steps: Mix butter, sugar, egg and vanilla on a tray
Add flour, yeast and chocolate
Stir gently
Form small balls
Place on a greased shape

foodsCategories.title: Tasty and Delicious
foodsCategories.subtitle: Steak A Role
foodsCategories.description: A delicious steak to eat with the family on weekends, easy to make and quick in preparation
steps: Spice steaks with salt
Add onion and garlic
Mix well and stir for 30 minutes
Fill with bacon
Prepare tomato sauce
Mix for 10 minutes

foodsCategories.title: Best Whole Wheat
foodsCategories.subtitle: Chocolate Chippers
foodsCategories.description: A cookie is a baked or cooked food that is typically small, flat and sweet. It usually contains flour, sugar, egg, and some type of oil, fat, or butter. It may include other ingredients such as raisins, oats, chocolate chips, nuts, etc.
steps: Mix butter, sugar, egg and vanilla on a tray
Add flour, yeast and chocolate
Stir gently
Form small balls
Place on a greased shape

foodsCategories.title: Simple Soft Cake
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple Cakes
foodsCategories.description: A delight, and super cute. Simple Blended Cake Recipe!
steps: in the blender, beat the margarine, sugar and egg until it forms a homogeneous mixture
gradually add milk and flour, beating always
add the yeast and stir with a spoon until incorporated into the mixture
separate 1/3 of the dough and set aside
bring the dough to a shape, greased and floured
add the chocolate powder to the reserved dough and beat well
turn the black mass over the white mass, into the form, quite carefully
bake in medium, preheated oven, until it bakes

foodsCategories.title: Paçoca Cake
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple Soft Cake
foodsCategories.description: Make an easy and tasty cake to eat with the family
steps: put the eggs, sweetener and butter in the mixer, beat everything until it becomes a fluffy cream

add the vanilla essence, and go alternating the milk with the wheat flour. Remove from the mixer and add the paçoquinhas in the form of farofa and the baking powder. Mix and place in a greased and floured form. Bake preheated at 180ºC for about 30 minutes
after roasting, wait to cool and cover the cake with the sweet milk and sprinkle the diet paçoca on top

foodsCategories.title: Chocolate Cake
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple Soft Cake
foodsCategories.description: Soft and delicious Chocolate Cake to eat with friends
ingredients: colheres de chá de fermento em pó
steps: In a bowl place the first 3 dried ingredients sifted and mix well. In a cup mix the 3 eggs and add in the mixture together with the oil, until the dough looks like a paste, after very well mixed, add the boiling water and stir, a very soft dough, add the salt the yeast and the sodium spourate and stir gently until well mixed,  place in a greased and floured shape, bake 180º to 200º for 30 to 40 minutes or until pierced with toothpick and it comes out clean
Bring to the fire all ingredients
After boiling let cook for 5 minutes over low heat stirring constantly
Place the topping on the cake and sprinkle with granulated chocolate
As soon as you turn on the heat to bake the cake, place a container with water in the oven, this will make the cake get more wet and juicy
Drill multiple holes in the cake with toothpick or fork so that the cover penetrates

foodsCategories.title: Grandma's Candy
foodsCategories.subtitle: Sweet and Yummy
foodsCategories.description: Sweet recipe to eat with family reunited
steps: Grind the cookies until they are well undone. Book.
Pour the yogurts in a bowl. Beat the egg whites, add the sugar gradually, beating always until they are very hard and shiny, and wrap them gently with the yogurt.
Distribute the previous cream by bowls, making it in alternating layers with the ground wafer. Take it cold until serving time. At that time, cover the surface of each bowl with fresh mango pulp.

foodsCategories.title: Brigadeiro
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple & Delicious
foodsCategories.description: Simple and delicious chocolate brigadier recipe, made for meeting in the afternoon
steps: Pour into the glass the margarine broken into small pieces, condensed milk and 2 tablespoons of chocolate powder.
12 minutes cooked

Remove into a container greased with oil and allow to cool (the process is frankly faster if we put it in the refrigerator). After cold, make balls with hands slightly greased, and pass through chocolate rolls. Put on paper bags.

foodsCategories.title: Banana Candy
foodsCategories.subtitle: Few Ingredients
foodsCategories.description: Sweet banana, easy to make and with few ingredients and delicious
steps: Cut the dried banana into very small pieces and the fresh banana into cubes.
Place the dried banana in the pan with 1 cup of water. Leave to hydrate over medium heat for about 10 minutes.
Add the chopped fresh banana and stir until incorporated. Add more water if necessary.
Cook, stirring constantly until a homogeneous dough forms where you see a few pieces of dried banana (about 10-15 minutes)
Remove from heat and store in refrigerator in lidded bowl.

foodsCategories.title: Chocolate Cookie
foodsCategories.subtitle: Guaranteed Fun
steps: In a bowl, add the granulated sugar with the yellow sugar with the butter at room temperature, beat until you get a cream.
Now add the whole egg, a yolk, vanilla extract, a tablespoon of milk and beat again until everything is incorporated.
Finally add the flour, yeast, chocolate and a pinch of salt, all sifted into the mixture, uses a wooden spoon to help create the dough.

Now grind the chocolate and add this dough, mix, now cut a rectangle of cling film and pour a little dough, with the help of the film create a thin roll of dough, then wrap in the film and tie the ends, take to the freezer, repeat until you roll the whole dough, in my case it was 2 large rolls and 1 small.

foodsCategories.title: Simple Coffee
foodsCategories.subtitle: In the Mornings
steps: Bring the water to a boil and add the sugar.
When it bubbles, turn off the heat.
Adjust the filter paper to the shard holder.
Place the coffee powder in the paper filter.
Sing the coffee.

foodsCategories.title: Capuccino Coffee
foodsCategories.subtitle: In the Mornings
steps: In a bowl, love the soluble coffee with a potato doughr or spoon.
Add milk powder, chocolate, sugar, cinnamon, bicarbonate and mix. Transfer to pots with lid and store for up to 2 months.
Para preparar, coloque de 2 a 3 colheres (sopa) do cappuccino em uma xícara com 250ml de água quente e misture até dissolver.

foodsCategories.title: Roast Chicken
foodsCategories.subtitle: Buttery and Soft
foodsCategories.description: Roasted chicken with mateiga, yields up to five-part and with minimum duration
steps: Cook the potato in boiling salted water for 3 minutes and drain.
Em uma vasilha, misture a manteiga, o alho, as ervas, sal e pimenta.
Season the chicken inside and out with the mixture and place on a baking sheet with the potato.
Place in the oven high, preheated, for 30 minutes.
Lower the temperature to medium and ass for another 30 minutes.

foodsCategories.title: Chicken Chess
foodsCategories.subtitle: Traditional & Wet
foodsCategories.description: Traditional Chess Chicken. Very tasty and delicious, made to bring the best in lunches.
steps: Cut the chicken fillets into medium squares and season with salt and black pepper to taste. Add little salt in case you use salted peanuts.
Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add the chicken fillets and fry until golden brown. Add the peppers and the sliced onion and fry.
Then add the peanut. Mix soy sauce, ketchup and cornstarch. Also take to the pan and allow to heat, without stopping stirring.

foodsCategories.title: Cooked Chicken
foodsCategories.subtitle: Stew & Vegetables
foodsCategories.description: Chicken stew with plenty of vegetables. Delicious and with plenty of sauce. Do yours and eat in the middle of the afternoon.
steps: Wash the chicken pieces well under running water.
Then soak in lemon juice for about 5 minutes.
Wash well to take the juice out completely. In a saucepan, heat the olive oil and add the chicken pieces.
Junte os demais ingredientes e, mexendo sempre para não grudar no fundo da panela, refogue a carne no caldo que se forma naturalmente
Cozinhe durante 30 minutos, sempre em fogo baixo. Se precisar, coloque mais água quente, aos poucos. No final, a carne deverá estar cozida e com molho reduzido.

foodsCategories.title: Chicken Strogonoff
foodsCategories.subtitle: Easy and Fast
foodsCategories.description: Chicken Strogonoff is a delicious, practical and easy to make recipe.Before the recipe we will talk a little about this dish so consumed around the world.
steps: Mix the chicken with garlic, mayonnaise, salt and pepper.
In a saucepan, heat the butter and add the onion.
Let it brown and add the chicken until golden brown too.
Add mushrooms, ketchup and mustard.
When it starts to boil, add the cream and turn off the heat.
Serve with white rice and potato straw.

foodsCategories.title: Caipirinha Original
foodsCategories.subtitle: Appreciated
foodsCategories.description: Do you know how the caipirinha drink is made, the most appreciated cocktail inside and outside Brazil? Made with lemon and cachaça, the original recipe uses the national distillate made from fermented sugarcane juice. But you can find variations of the drink, mixed with other types of fruits such as strawberry, kiwi, passion fruit, pineapple and even pepper. Would you really know if you're drinking the legitimate capirinha?
steps: Fill a glass with 60 ml of luquo.
Squeeze your lemons into drink.
Add sugar to your drink and mix well.

foodsCategories.title: Fruit Cocktail
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple & Easy
foodsCategories.description: See this Simple Fruit Cocktail Recipe, it's a delight, it doesn't accompany alcohol, and kids can drink at will.
steps: Beat in the blender all the ingredients except guarana.
Add some of the guarana and beat a little more.
Pour into a large bowl and add guarana to your liking until you get the desired point.
Be careful, because when being cold the cocktail gains creaminess, so do not leave the cream so thick.
Bring to frost and serve with ice stones.
